title: Deadpool Rewatch - Every Marvel Movie Ranked & Recapped - In Review

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% OFF 2 or more pairs of shades.

This episode of Kinda Funny In Review we rewatch, rank, review, and recap 2016's Deadpool starring Ryan Reynolds.
